summary: This is an email forwarding a link to a New York Daily News article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's final days at NYC jail revealed by inmates'. The email references the article's content about inmates Efrain Reyes and Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article detailing his final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City.

persons.name: Efrain Reyes
persons.context: An inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who is mentioned in the forwarded news article about Jeffrey Epstein's final days.

connections.description: Reyes was an inmate at the same jail as Epstein and is referenced in a news article about Epstein's final days, suggesting he may have had observations or information.

events.title: Publication of Daily News Article on Epstein's Final Days
events.description: The New York Daily News publishes a story detailing Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in NYC, based on accounts from inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York City
keyFacts: A news article published on December 28, 2020, details Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in NYC.
The article includes accounts from inmates, specifically mentioning an inmate named Efrain Reyes.
The document is an email forwarding a link to this New York Daily News story.
